interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Reusable Cotton Swab Portable Silicone Swab Washable Cotton Swabs for Ear Cleaning Beauty Treatment Makeup Cotton Swab Review Date: 2020/09/25 Store: JAOYU Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 0.39 inches', 'UPC': '739232135913'} Review Text: I was skeptical. I am autistic, and I hate the feel of water in my ears, so I use cotton swabs to dry my ears after a shower. This adds up to a lot of swabs and I felt guilty about putting that many into the trash when I could make a tiny difference environmentally. I didn't really think the silicone option would work. The cotton soaks up the water. But the little knobby end actually does pull the water out of my ear canal.

The case is fine. I feel like the rubber bit that holds it together will eventually break. It is just flimsy. But, for now, it does its job. I ordered the blue, and it is a pretty dull blue, but the swab works, so whatever. Review Title: It Works Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AuroTrends Makeup Remover Towel,2 Pack Reusable Chemical-free Microfiber Makeup Remover Cloths,Magically and Gently Wipe Away Cosmetics,Sunscreen,Oil and Dirt,Set of 2 (Pink+Black) AuroTrends {'Brand': 'AuroTrends', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.72 x 1.42 inches; 6.4 Ounces'} These are really soft. Also, even when they are soaking wet, they don't feel drippy. I am weird about having water on/in my face, and these cloths allow me to wash my face without triggering an odd anxious feeling. I really like these cloths and always keep one on hand. Really Soft TELETIES - Spiral Hair Coils - Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women - Phone Cord Hair Ties - Strong Grip, No Rip, Water Resistant, No Crease Hair Tie Coils - 3 pack (Large, Maliblu) Teleties {'Material': 'Fabric', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Teleties', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '711841892807'} I love telephone cord style hair ties. They gather all of my hair into a ponytail or bun easily and, best of all, they don't give me headaches like more traditional hair elastics. These are a pretty combination of aqua blue and white, and they are very sturdy. No Headaches RAREKIND Fade Matte Lipstick by Amorepacific - 10 Colors, Cruelty-Free Nourishing Lip Stick, Velvety-smooth, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lipstick - 3.2g Maple Road RAREKIND {'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.95 Ounces'} Eh. The color is bit more orange-y than I’d hoped for by the photo. It’s really thick. It doesn’t stay put or feel great on. I might try mixing it with some gloss if I liked the color more. Not thrilled Reusable Cotton Swab Portable Silicone Swab Washable Cotton Swabs for Ear Cleaning Beauty Treatment Makeup Cotton Swab JAOYU {'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 0.39 inches', 'UPC': '739232135913'} I was skeptical. I am autistic, and I hate the feel of water in my ears, so I use cotton swabs to dry my ears after a shower. This adds up to a lot of swabs and I felt guilty about putting that many into the trash when I could make a tiny difference environmentally. I didn't really think the silicone option would work. The cotton soaks up the water. But the little knobby end actually does pull the water out of my ear canal.

The case is fine. I feel like the rubber bit that holds it together will eventually break. It is just flimsy. But, for now, it does its job. I ordered the blue, and it is a pretty dull blue, but the swab works, so whatever. It Works
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Values reusable, chemical-free skincare and hair accessory solutions while increasingly focusing on cosmetic textures and color accuracy. The recent purchase of a silicone swab indicates a continued interest in eco-friendly alternatives that align with personal values.
  
- **Material Preference:** Prefers soft, high-quality materials that enhance comfort, particularly fabric-based items. The latest interaction suggests a positive reception toward innovative materials, although concerns remain regarding product durability.

- **Skin Sensitivity:** Sensitive to water, with specific discomfort linked to ear care, emphasizing the need for products that support comfort and alleviate anxiety. The successful experience with the swabs reflects a desire for practical solutions that minimize discomfort.

- **Functionality:** Strongly prioritizes practicality and effectiveness across routines. The positive functionality of the silicone swab highlights an appreciation for tools that deliver on performance, while also indicating a need for ongoing evaluation of product longevity.

- **Consistency in Purchasing:** Exhibits consistent behavior in seeking out reusable products that meet comfort and practicality needs. The recent positive experience indicates a growing confidence in innovative solutions that might reduce environmental impact without sacrificing usability. 

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Likely to rate products based on their alignment with personal comfort and practical needs. The user's discerning approach to quality, especially following mixed experiences in cosmetics, underscores an evolving standard for product performance across categories. 

Overall, the user continues to prioritize comfort, functionality, and environmental responsibility while remaining critical about product efficacy and durability.
